Clan Level-UpLevel-Up your clan!

If you want to level-up your clan, you will need some Donate Cards Master per level.
Level 1 to 5: 1 Donate Card Master Level 5 to 6: 10 Donate Cards Master Level 6 to 7: 15 Donate Cards Master Level 7 to 8: 20 Donate Cards Master Level 8 to 9: 30 Donate Cards Master Level 9 to 10: 40 Donate Cards Master Level 10 to 11: 50 Donate Cards Master
